children.title: Introduction
children.content:
# Kiichain Node Installation Guide

This guide will walk you through the complete process of setting up a Kiichain node on your system.

## ğŸ“‹ Prerequisites

- Ubuntu 20.04+ or compatible Linux distribution
- Sudo privileges
- Stable internet connection

## ğŸš€ Installation Steps

### 1. Update System and Install Build Tools

```bash
sudo apt update
sudo apt-get install git curl build-essential make jq gcc snapd chrony lz4 tmux unzip bc -y
```

### 2. Install Go

Remove any existing Go installation and install the required version:

```bash
rm -rf $HOME/go
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go
cd $HOME
curl https://dl.google.com/go/go1.23.5.linux-amd64.tar.gz | sudo tar -C/usr/local -zxvf -

cat <<'EOF' >>$HOME/.profile
export GOROOT=/usr/local/go
export GOPATH=$HOME/go
export GO111MODULE=on
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin:$HOME/go/bin
EOF

source $HOME/.profile
go version
```

### 3. Install Kiichain Node

Clone the repository and build the node:

```bash
cd $HOME
rm -rf kiichain
git clone https://github.com/kiichain/kiichain.git
cd kiichain
git checkout v4.0.0
make install
kiichaind version
```

### 4. Initialize Node

Initialize your node with a custom moniker:

> âš ï¸ **Important**: Replace `NodeName` with your desired moniker

```bash
kiichaind init NodeName --chain-id=oro_1336-1
```

### 5. Download Genesis File

```bash
curl -Ls https://ss-t.kiichain.nodestake.org/genesis.json > $HOME/.kiichain/config/genesis.json
```

### 6. Download Address Book

```bash
curl -Ls https://ss-t.kiichain.nodestake.org/addrbook.json > $HOME/.kiichain/config/addrbook.json
```

### 7. Create Systemd Service

Create a service file for automatic node management:

```bash
sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/kiichaind.service > /dev/null <<EOF
[Unit]
Description=kiichaind Daemon
After=network-online.target

[Service]
User=$USER
ExecStart=$(which kiichaind) start
Restart=always
RestartSec=3
LimitNOFILE=65535

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable kiichaind
```

### 8. Download Snapshot (Optional)

To speed up synchronization, you can download a snapshot:

```bash
SNAP_NAME=$(curl -s https://ss-t.kiichain.nodestake.org/ | egrep -o ">20.*\.tar.lz4" | tr -d ">")
curl -o - -L https://ss-t.kiichain.nodestake.org/${SNAP_NAME} | lz4 -c -d - | tar -x -C $HOME/.kiichain
```

### 9. Launch Node

Start the node and monitor logs:

```bash
sudo systemctl restart kiichaind
journalctl -u kiichaind -f
```

## ğŸ” Useful Commands

### Check Node Status
```bash
sudo systemctl status kiichaind
```

### Stop Node
```bash
sudo systemctl stop kiichaind
```

### Restart Node
```bash
sudo systemctl restart kiichaind
```

### View Logs
```bash
journalctl -u kiichaind -f
```

### Check Sync Status
```bash
kiichaind status 2>&1 | jq .SyncInfo
```

## ğŸ“ Notes

- The node will take some time to sync with the network
- Make sure ports are properly configured in your firewall
- Keep your node updated with the latest releases
- Monitor your node regularly for optimal performance

## ğŸ†˜ Troubleshooting

If you encounter issues:

1. Check the logs: `journalctl -u kiichaind -f`
2. Verify Go installation: `go version`
3. Ensure all dependencies are installed
4. Check available disk space: `df -h`
5. Verify node binary: `kiichaind version`

## ğŸ“š Resources

- [Kiichain GitHub Repository](https://github.com/kiichain/kiichain)
- [NodeStake Snapshot Server](https://ss-t.kiichain.nodestake.org/)

---

*Last updated: 2025*

children.title: Kiichain v3.0.0 to v4.0.0 Upgrade Commands
children.content:
# Kiichain v3.0.0 to v4.0.0 Upgrade Commands

```javascript
mkdir -p $HOME/.kiichain/cosmovisor/upgrades/v4.0.0/bin
rm -rf $HOME/.kiichain
cd $HOME
git clone https://github.com/KiChain/kiichain.git
cd kiichain
git checkout v4.0.0
make build
cp ./build/kiichaind $HOME/.kiichain/cosmovisor/upgrades/v4.0.0/bin/kiichaind
chmod +x $HOME/.kiichain/cosmovisor/upgrades/v4.0.0/bin/kiichaind
$HOME/.kiichain/cosmovisor/upgrades/v4.0.0/bin/kiichaind version
```
